definition: to rhyme/sometimes written 壓韻|压韵
to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: In remembering, names, for instance, a 13)rhyme association works wonders.
sentences.chinese: 對於記憶，比方說記名字，押韻聯想的作用非凡。

sentences.english: This is also one of the popular and oldest methods in memorization.
sentences.chinese: “押韻法”也是一種相當古老並且流行的記憶法。

sentences.english: London Bridge is falling down, Falling down, Falling down.
sentences.chinese: 《倫敦鐵橋垮下來》有相當大的變化的歌詞的押韻。

sentences.english: Blank verse is unrhymed iambic pentameter.
sentences.chinese: 無韻詩是不押韻的抑揚格五步格詩。

sentences.english: The number rhyme system uses words that rhyme with the numbers to make up the story.
sentences.chinese: 號碼押韻方案是用與號碼押韻的單詞來編故事。

sentences.english: The number rhyme system uses words that rhyme with the numbers to make up the story.
sentences.chinese: 號碼押韻方案是用與號碼押韻的單詞來編故事。

sentences.english: Tang poetry, for example, rhymes and sounds much better when read in Cantonese than in Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 比如唐詩用粵語讀起來押韻和發音都比普通話好。

sentences.english: The author points out that a special kind of rhy…
sentences.chinese: 指出丘詩在七言古詩存在一種特別的押韻樣式。

sentences.english: He rhymed out sonnets in her praise.
sentences.chinese: 他寫成押韻的十四行詩歌頌她。

sentences.english: The lines have distinctly a sonnet rhyme-scheme, but look closely.
sentences.chinese: 這14行明顯使用了十四行詩的押韻規則，但仔細看。

sentences.english: Rhyming stories for phonics practice. Stories combine phonically decodable words with high frequently words.
sentences.chinese: 高頻率生字和押韻故事有助兒童學習英語拼音。

sentences.english: Read on, to learn more about Cockney rhyming slang.
sentences.chinese: 接着讀一讀吧，來更多地瞭解一下老倫敦的押韻俚語。

sentences.english: I use rhymes to remember new English words.
sentences.chinese: 我會使用押韻的方式來記住生字。

sentences.english: Now most rhymed poems in Milton's day were end-stopped lines of verse.
sentences.chinese: 彌爾頓時期的大部分押韻詩都使用孤聯詩句。

sentences.english: Its rhyming lanes show the phonetic features of Shaanxi-Gansu dialects.
sentences.chinese: 其押韻規律反映着陝甘方言的語音特徵。

sentences.english: It features rhymed patter, which will have the audience rolling on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 它具有押韻模式，這將令觀衆滾動在地板上。

definition: rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
the four tones of Middle Chinese: level tone 平聲|平声, rising tone 上聲|上声, departing tone 去聲|去声 and entering tone 入聲|入声/the four tones of Modern Standard Mandarin
antithesis (two lines of poetry matching in sense and sound)/to fight/to wage war
entering tone/checked tone/one of the four tones of Middle Chinese
pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
